fields.name: Day 5:
fields.value:
I stayed at my camp today, trying to find a way to deal with the grass. While resting, I was drawing the landscape. I placed down my pen to prepare food, and when I picked it back up, the landscape had changed. The mountains appeared to be in a new arrangement. This happened several times today. I know not what caused it, but I fear I am ill-equipped to deal with it...
Attack: None
Defense: Powerful

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Move outside somebody's house at night, preventing visits to and from that person.
- Once per game, at night, become a barrier on the player list, preventing players from targeting anyone who is on the other side of the barrier.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot be roleblocked or redirected.
- Nothing can lower your defense.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Rocks.
